scripts.get-hdb: curl -k -s -n https://www.ssz-webdav.stadt-zuerich.ch/HDB_Dropzone/HDB.zip -o input/HDB.zip && unzip -o input/HDB.zip HDB.csv && mv HDB.csv input/hdb.csv
scripts.clean-hdb: cat target/hdb.nt target/hdb_referenznummer.nt | sed '/_:/d' | sed '/<file/d' > target/hdb-clean.nt
scripts.build: npm-run-all clean get-hdb get-dimensions convert-hdb convert-dimensions clean-dimensions clean-hdb put-void post-hdb post-dimensions
scripts.build-local: npm-run-all clean get-hdb get-dimensions convert-hdb convert-dimensions clean-dimensions clean-hdb
